T02D3335:26b-1: padma nar te shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3335:26b-3: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3335:26b-4: bcom ldan 'das padma gar dbang la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3335:26b-5: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms
T02D3335:26b-6: pa'i rjes su sna tshogs padma'i steng du zla ba
T02D3335:26b-7: la hr'i:yongs su gyur pa las padma gar gyi dbang
T02D3335:27a-1: dbang phyug sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas pa /
T02D3335:27a-4: yan lag thams cad dmar po lha rdzas kyi na bza'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3335:27a-5: 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can /
T02D3335:27a-6: g-yon phyogs su gos dkar mo la mnyam par 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o //
T02D3335:27a-7: g-yon pa'i phyag na padma dmar po bsnams pa /
T02D3335:27a-8: gar gyi tshul gyis khab kyi phyag rgyas padma kha 'byed pa ni phyag g-yas pas so //
T02D3335:27a-9: bdag nyid skad cig gis bskyed la /
T02D3335:27a-10: aom k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3335:27a-11: zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D3335:27a-12: de nas phyogs mtshams brgyad dang /
T02D3335:27a-13: lha mo brgyad bsam par bya ste /
T02D3335:27a-14: de la 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma'i shar gyi 'dab ma la rnam par gzigs ma /
T02D3335:27a-15: dkar mo padma dmar po bsnams pa'o //
T02D3335:27a-16: lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la sgrol ma autpa la ljang gu bsnams pa'o //
T02D3335:27a-17: nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la dbang phyug ma ser mo autpa la sngon po bsnams pa'o //
T02D3335:27a-18: byang gi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can dkar mo padma ser po bsnams pa'o //
T02D3335:27a-19: shar gyi mtshams kyi padma'i 'dab ma la gnas ma ser mo btsod lta bu'i padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D3335:27a-20: lho phyogs kyi mtshams kyi 'dab ma la padma'i dbang
T02D3335:27a-21: phyug nam mkha'i mdog lta bu padma dkar po bsnams
T02D3335:27a-22: pa'o // nub phyogs kyi mtshams kyi 'dab ma la
T02D3335:27a-23: sna tshogs padma dkar po padma nag po bsnams pa'o
T02D3335:27a-24: pa'o // // byang phyogs kyi mtshams kyi 'dab ma
T02D3335:27a-25: la sna tshogs rdo rje ma sna tshogs kyi padma
T02D3335:27a-26: pa'o // // bsnams pa'o // 'di thams cad ni skyil mo krung can phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3335:27a-27: zhal gcig pa nye bar zhi ba'o //
T02D3335:27a-28: ze'u 'bru'i dbus su 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D3335:27a-29: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
T02D3335:27a-30: go // aom hr'i:padma na rte shva ra h'um /
T02D3335:27a-31: zhes bya ba bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3335:27a-32: padma gar dbang gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so //
T02D3335:27a-33: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
